main event: A bluish-white object was observed traveling in a southerly direction in Macedonia, Ohio on July 10, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as round with a smaller circle in the middle., The estimated size of the object was about 300 ft., The object was seen moving straight and then ascended at a 30 degree angle., The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes., The report suggested it could be a satellite.
sighted object: bluish-white round object with a smaller circle in the middle
witness description: The witness wished to remain anonymous and confirmed seeing the object with no additional witnesses.
